tool_description:
Powerful API for Indian PUC Information

- Certificate Number
- Number Plate Image
- Vehicle Brand Name
- Vehicle Type
and Much more....

contact : flashbomberapp@gmail.com
name: Vehicle PUC API
title: Vehicle PUC API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-puc-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-puc-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-puc-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-puc-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
